verification.dm.welcome: Welcome to {{server}}! Please complete verification to access the server.
verification.dm.skipped: You were manually marked as verified by staff.
verification.dm.kicked: You were removed from {{server}} due to verification failure.
verification.dm.awaiting_approval: Your verification is complete. A staff member will approve you soon.
verification.dm.captcha_required: A captcha challenge is required before you can proceed.
verification.dm.captcha_passed_high: Captcha passed. You are now verified!
captcha.prompt: Please solve this captcha using the provided code: {{code}}
captcha.invalid: Invalid captcha code. Please try again.
captcha.expired: Captcha expired. Request a new challenge.
errors.captcha.not_required: Captcha not required for this profile.
verification.dm.timeout_expired: Your verification request expired after {{minutes}} minutes on {{server}}. Please rejoin or contact staff.
verification.console.timeout_expired: Verification timeout expired for user {{user}} after {{minutes}}m.
captcha.expired.notice: Your captcha challenge expired. Request a new one.
verification.challenge.title: Verification Required
verification.challenge.desc.code: Please reply with the verification code below.
verification.challenge.desc.web: Open the link below or reply with the code if the link fails.
verification.challenge.desc.button: Click the button below to verify.
verification.instructions.title: üîê Verification Instructions
verification.instructions.desc: Enter the code you received (DM or here) to unlock access. If you never received a code, ask staff to resend it.
verification.instructions.value.timeout: Challenges expire after the configured timeout.
verification.message.lockout: Too many incorrect attempts. Verification failed. Please rejoin or contact staff.
verification.message.expired: Your verification challenge expired. Please rejoin for a new one.

errors.cannotBan: ‚ùå Cannot ban this user. They may have higher permissions.
errors.cannotKick: ‚ùå Cannot kick this user. They may have higher permissions.
errors.roleHierarchy: ‚ùå You cannot take action against someone with equal or higher roles.
